message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This price reflects its high quality and value. I'm confident it will be a great investment for you.  Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $1,350,000? I believe this would still provide a good return on investment for me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I appreciate your offer, $1,350,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,375,000, which still leaves room for both of us to be satisfied. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering your latest offer, I am still aiming to keep my investment within my specified budget. Could we perhaps meet in the middle at $1,362,500? This would allow for a fair compromise between our interests.
